backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining user profiles, moments, challenges, chat data structures, and initial sample connections with storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions for light/dark modes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router setup with protected routes, layout wrapper, and page registrations.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Onboarding component collecting initial profile data and saving it before redirecting to the MBTI quiz.
frontend/src/components/comfort/ComfortM: Provides a context for comfort mode, syncing its state with the user profile and offering a toggle function.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Transie: Displays a temporary animated banner that auto-hides or can be dismissed manually.
frontend/src/components/highlights/Weekl: Shows the top weekly highlight or an empty-state message if no moments exist.
frontend/src/components/layout/ZenLayout: Wraps pages with a gradient background and includes the main navigation bar.
frontend/src/components/nav/ZenNav.tsx: Renders responsive navigation with authentication handling and dynamic links based on login state.
frontend/src/components/profile/EmojiAva: Provides a grid of selectable emoji avatars with highlighting for the chosen one.
frontend/src/components/profile/TagMulti: Offers multi-select tags with predefined options plus custom user-defined entries.
frontend/src/constants/allowedAvatars.ts: Defines allowed emoji avatars and a helper to validate them.
frontend/src/constants/profileOptions.ts: Lists predefined interests and perspectives for profile setup and editing.
frontend/src/data/globalChatSeed.ts: Contains seed messages to populate the global chat when empty.
frontend/src/data/mockCircles.ts: Provides mock circle data for frontend-only navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboardingCompleti: A hook that stores and retrieves an onboarding completion message in sessionStorage with setters and clearers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks interacting with backend actors to fetch and mutate user profiles, moments, challenges, and messaging data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables, custom ZenLink colors, and reusable glass-card and button classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat interface that loads a conversation with a selected partner, displays messages, and allows sending new messages.
frontend/src/pages/CircleDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a selected circle using mock data, including description, member count, and navigation back to the circles list.
frontend/src/pages/CirclesPage.tsx: Displays private circles, allows creating a new circle with a name and topic, and navigates to individual circle pages.
frontend/src/pages/DailyChallengesPage.t: Shows daily emotional growth challenges, tracks streaks, and lets users mark challenges as complete.
frontend/src/pages/DebateRoomsPage.tsx: Lists live debate rooms and provides an in-room view with guidelines and a hand-raise feature.
frontend/src/pages/EmotionalSafetyPage.t: Explains AI-driven emotional safety features like message reflection, toxicity prevention, and distress support.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalChartPage.tsx: Displays global community statistics including active users, trending MBTI types, and emotional trends.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalChatPage.tsx: Provides a global chat feed with perspective tagging, message posting, and fallback seed messages when backend is empty.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main home page with user profile info, motivational quotes, navigation links, and top moments.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the public landing page with hero content, vision overview, and login or start button.
frontend/src/pages/MatchingPage.tsx: Shows available user connections and lets users start a chat or view profile details.
frontend/src/pages/MbtiQuizPage.tsx: Implements an MBTI personality quiz, calculates a result, and saves it to the user profile.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Loads and edits the user profile including display name, avatar, preferences, and interests.
Displays categorized top weekly moments with loading state and styled highlight cards.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyMomentsPage.tsx: Renders a page to view top weekly moments and submit new ones, including a dialog form and impact button. Uses query hooks for loading, submitting, and incrementing impact.
frontend/src/utils/strings.ts: Provides helpers to normalize strings and check array membership case- and trim-insensitively.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and handling hash-based routing. Supports persisted parameters and safe clearing of stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, keyframes, and container settings with custom theme tokens and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, known issues, and required features for polishing the app, including home quote, circle entry, chat fix, and seeded global chat.
